TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpApplicationStateWrapper extends System.Web.HttpApplicationStateBase

summary.span: 封装可用于在 ASP.NET 应用程序内多个请求和会话间共享信息的 HTTP 内部对象。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables information to be shared across multiple requests and sessions within an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并充当包装类。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开的功能类，同时还公开了类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class while also exposing the type. 类，可替换的原始实现使用自定义实现，如执行单元测试在 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
